text: The 2016 Tampere Open was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the 35th edition of the tournament which was part of the 2015 ATP Challenger Tour and the 2015 ITF Women's Circuit. It took place in Tampere, Finland, on 18–24 July 2016. == Men's Singles main draw entrants == === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Aslan Karatsev, 6–4, 3–6, 7–5 === Women's Singles === * Piia Suomalainen def. Emma Laine, 0–6, 6–2, 6–3 === Men's Doubles === * David Pérez Sanz / Max Schnur def. Steven de Waard / Andreas Mies, 6–4, 6–4 === Women's Doubles === * Emma Laine / Julia Wachaczyk def.
